title: A Joe Rogan Experience Review 183
description:
This week we review podcast 1366 Richard Dawkins and 1368 Edward Snowden.

Richard Dawkins  is an English ethologist, evolutionary biologist, and author. He is an emeritus fellow of New College, Oxford, and was the University of Oxford's Professor for Public Understanding of Science from 1995 until 2008.

Edward Snowden is an American whistleblower who copied and leaked highly classified information from the National Security Agency in 2013 when he was a Central Intelligence Agency employee and subcontractor.

Join us for a special international episode where Adam and Mark discuss politics and religion. It might be a recipe for a horrid Thanksgiving, but it makes for a great podcast! 

Check out these links for some fascinating supplemental info on this week's podcast. 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Snowden

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Dawkins

Richard Dawkins' New Book: Outgrowing God: A Beginner's Guide

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stellar_Wind

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Protect_America_Act_of_2007

Please email us here with any suggestions and questions for future shows..
